titleStmt.title: A Protestant antidote against Popery with a brief discourse of the great atheisticalness and vain amours now in fashion. Written in a letter to a young lady. By a Person of Honour.
titleStmt.author: Person of honour.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed; and are to be sold by Joseph Wilde, bookseller in Castle-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Trinity College Library, Dublin.
